about.title: About
about.description: Our app is a powerful and simple tool to help you manage your personal finances. We understand how important it is to be in control of your money, and that's why we've created this app.
about.openSource: Our app is open source, which means that it's free for everyone to use and contribute to. You can access all of the code and make any changes you want, and you can use it for personal use without any restrictions.
about.adFree: Our app is also ad-free, meaning you won't be bombarded with annoying pop-ups or advertisements while using it. This makes for a clean and seamless experience, and it also ensures your privacy is protected.
about.paidOptions: The only paid options we offer are customization options such as font and theme changes. This is to help support our ongoing development and maintenance of the app.
about.support: If you have any questions or feedback, please feel free to contact us at support@app.com

addCategory.deleteText: This will delete the category and all its transactions

addTransaction.noCategoryList: No Category present. Please create a category first.

addGroup.deleteText: This will delete the group and all its transactions will be unlinked

help.title: Help
help.transaction: Add a Transaction using the + button. When you add a transaction, you can select a category, group, and amount. You can also add a note to the transaction., There are 3 types of transactions: Income, Expense, and Transfer. Income is when you receive money, Expense is when you spend money, and Transfer is when you move money from one account to another.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.informationWeCollectText: We collect information from you when you register on our app. When registering, we ask for your name, email address, and phone number. We may also collect information about your device, such as your IP address, browser type, and operating system.
privacyPolicy.howWeUseInformationText: We use the information we collect from you to provide you with a better experience. We may also use your information to contact you about our app and to send you updates about our app.
privacyPolicy.dataStorageText: We store your data on your device. We do not store your data on our servers.
privacyPolicy.dataSharingText: We do not share your data with anyone.
privacyPolicy.yourRightsText: You have the right to request a copy of the information we have about you, and to request that we delete that information. You also have the right to request that we correct any information we have about you that is incorrect. You also have the right to request that we stop using your information.
privacyPolicy.securityText: We take security seriously and take appropriate measures to protect your information. We use encryption to protect your information and we have a secure server.
privacyPolicy.changesToPolicyText: We may update this policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes to this policy by posting the new policy on this page.
privacyPolicy.contactUsText: If you have any questions or feedback, please feel free to contact us at support@app.com

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.acceptanceText: By downloading, installing, or using our app, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our app.
termsOfService.descriptionText: Our app is a personal finance management tool that helps you track your income, expenses, and financial transactions. The app provides features for categorizing transactions, creating groups, and generating reports.
termsOfService.userResponsibilitiesText: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your data and for all activities that occur within your use of the app. You agree to use the app only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms.
termsOfService.dataOwnershipText: You retain full ownership of all data you enter into the app. We do not claim any ownership rights to your personal financial information.
termsOfService.appUsageText: You may use the app for personal, non-commercial purposes. You may not use the app for any illegal or unauthorized purpose, or in any way that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair our servers.
termsOfService.intellectualPropertyText: The app and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by us and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.
termsOfService.disclaimerText: The app is provided 'as is' without any warranties. We do not guarantee that the app will be error-free or uninterrupted. We are not responsible for any financial decisions made based on the app's data.
termsOfService.limitationOfLiabilityText: In no event shall we be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.
termsOfService.terminationText: We may terminate or suspend your access to the app immediately, without prior notice, for any reason, including if you breach these Terms of Service.
termsOfService.changesToTermsText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new terms on this page.
termsOfService.governingLawText: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which we operate, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
termsOfService.contactUsText: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at support@app.com

second.text: The app is under development. Expect some bugs and visual glitches. Alot of the functionality is still being added and improved.

third.text: Thanks for trying our app. By continuing you help us develop the app.
